Text:
If you have any trouble, just leave a message.
I will keep an eye on this thread.
what does seeding and leechere do ? plz tell me :D

Seeders are people who are currently sharing the complete file/torrent. Leechers are people who are in the process of downloading it.
Please note, however, that the amount of seeders and leechers indicated here on TPB has been off for a while now. In my client (uTorrent) I'm seeing 18 seeders now, and 14 active seeds/leechers.
For more info, have a look here:
http://btfaq.com/serve/cache/23.html
^^ That should read "14 active peers/leechers".
everytime this game crashes, when im playing skirmish or the campaign.
Works flawlessly here. Can you give a bit more information? Which version of Windows are you running, are your graphics drivers up to date? Did you install the update before installing the crack?

Dear 4error.

But when i try to play a skirmish or campaign mission it suddenly crashes saying "The program has stop working" i don't understand why. i am running a Windows Vista 32.bit Dell Vostro 200. with a normal Video card. no fancy video card. the one that came with my Computer. I patched then cracked successfully but i don't really know why its crashing. Any advice or fixes?

Have you tried running the game in compatibility mode?
